home.add_tableau_btn: Add links to have custom tableau tabs
home.skip_header: Enable to skip the first row of the file uploaded but the order of columns should match with application data table. Disabling this option will match the column names in file with application data table.
home.append_data: Append uploaded data to the table instead of replacing the data.

user_settings.change_access_scenario: Choose scenario that will be available to the current user
user_settings.no_scenario_access: User doesn't have access to any scenario/table

tableau_settings.trusted: Enable trusted authentication to automatically login to Tableau to view the report
tableau_settings.extract: Enable/Disable Tableau Extract for each action below
tableau_settings.extractPowerBI: Enable/Disable PowerBI Import for each action below
tableau_settings.incorrect_user: Selected user is not found. Please select a user from the drop-down list

scenario_settings.optional_actions: Data refresh creates a button for manual execution of update script. Data validation uses validation script to monitor changes to tables.

master.master_tables: Whether to keep master tables up to date to build tableau reports on top of them
master.refresh_tables: Populate the selected scenarios master tables with fresh data

scenario.open_slack: Open slack modal window to choose current chat

execution.add_execute_btn: Add execution info to the list
